mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(a.id) as count ,IFNULL(SUM(b.up_order_count),0) as orderNum ,IFNULL(SUM(b.cost_fee),0) as groupMoney FROM pf_user_sku a LEFT JOIN pf_user_statistics b ON a.user_id=b.user_id AND a.sku_id=b.sku_id WHERE a.tree_code LIKE CONCAT(#{treeCode},'%');

SELECT COUNT(d.id) as r_count ,IFNULL(SUM(e.up_order_count),0) as r_orderNum ,IFNULL(SUM(e.cost_fee),0) as r_groupMoney FROM pf_user_sku a INNER JOIN pf_user_recommen_relation b ON a.user_id=b.user_pid AND a.sku_id=b.sku_id INNER JOIN pf_user_sku c ON b.user_id=c.user_id AND b.sku_id=c.sku_id INNER JOIN pf_user_sku d ON d.tree_code LIKE CONCAT(c.tree_code,'%') INNER JOIN pf_user_statistics e ON d.user_id=e.user_id AND d.sku_id=e.sku_id WHERE a.tree_code = #{treeCode};

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT e.user_id) AS COUNT, IFNULL(SUM(f.up_order_count), 0) AS orderNum, IFNULL(SUM(f.cost_fee), 0) AS groupMoney FROM pf_user_brand a INNER JOIN com_spu b ON a.brand_id = b.brand_id INNER JOIN com_sku c ON b.id = c.spu_id INNER JOIN pf_user_sku d ON a.user_id = d.user_id AND c.id = d.sku_id INNER JOIN pf_user_sku e ON e.tree_code LIKE CONCAT(d.tree_code, '%') INNER JOIN pf_user_statistics f ON e.user_id = f.user_id AND c.id = f.sku_id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT e.user_id) AS COUNT, IFNULL(SUM(f.up_order_count), 0) AS orderNum, IFNULL(SUM(f.cost_fee), 0) AS groupMoney FROM pf_user_brand a INNER JOIN com_spu b ON a.brand_id = b.brand_id INNER JOIN com_sku c ON b.id = c.spu_id INNER JOIN pf_user_sku d ON a.user_id = d.user_id AND c.id = d.sku_id INNER JOIN pf_user_sku e ON e.tree_code LIKE CONCAT(d.tree_code, '%') INNER JOIN pf_user_statistics f ON e.user_id = f.user_id AND c.id = f.sku_id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} AND a.brand_id = #{brandId}
